certifications.title: CCNAv7: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
CCNAv7: Enterprise Networking, Security, and Automation

projects.name: Collaborative Code Editor
projects.description: Designed and developed a real-time collaborative code editor using React, Node.js, and Socket.io, allowing multiple users to code simultaneously in C++, Java, and Python. Integrated unique room creation with uuid, enabling direct access via referral links. Implemented features such as synchronized code editing, multi-language support, real-time chat, and the ability to execute code within the application. Successfully managed the implementation of a multi-language code editor, incorporating syntax highlighting and integration with online compilers/interpreters. Integrated robust chat functionality for streamlined communication within the coding environment.

projects.name: Flood Management System
projects.description: Developed Defender, a comprehensive flood management system using PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript. Integrated a user-friendly donation feature to support flood relief efforts, enhancing community involvement. Implemented a weather feature, providing real-time weather information to aid in flood monitoring and preparedness. Designed and integrated a news gallery section for timely updates and information dissemination during flood events, ensuring users stay informed about the latest developments. Established a Help Center with a dedicated phone number, offering immediate assistance during emergencies. Included advisory documents and a comprehensive guide on flood prevention strategies to empower users with proactive measures.

full_output.name: Nirbhay Kumar
achievements_and_awards: Received the Deans List of Excellence three times in recognition for outstanding academic performance.
Earned a Certificate of Achievement from Codekaze by Coding Ninjas by securing the 1900th rank out of over a lakh students and progressed to Level 2.
